Using the NeedIt Form

Use the NeedIt application to request services and goods from serveral departments.

  • Legal
  • Human Resources
  • Facilities

NeedIt Form Fields

  1. For new NeedIt records, the Requested for is pre-populated with you name. If you are opening a new NeedIt request for someone else, you can change the value in the Requested for field.
  2. The Requested for email fields is automatically populated if you change the uer in the Requested for field. YOu can change the Requested for email field value.
  3. The Choices in the What needed field depend on the value in the Request type field.
  4. If the value in the What needed field is Other, the Other field appears. Use the Other field to add a few words about your request.
  5. User the calender picker in the When Needed field to set the due date for the NeedIt request.
  6. Use the Short description and Description fields to provide more information about your request.
Note: When creating NeedIt requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past.
